main.description: Describes the rights that an owner has with a hypercert, such as whether it can be sold, transferred, and under what conditions.

rightsType.description: Short rights identifier for easier search

rightsDescription.description: Description of the rights of this hypercert

attachment.description: An attachment to define the rights further, e.g. a legal document.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
